responses.rationale: 'grown to include eight people' reports a numerical metric (case count) using a standard descriptive verb.
'has risen rapidly' reports a numerical metric (herd count) using a standard verb ('risen') and a neutral adverb ('rapidly').
The segment describes physical symptoms and duration, not primarily economic or numerical metrics using standard verbs.
